price: Kwamba hakika bila ya shaka hii ni kauli ya Mjumbe mtukufu,
footnotes: Hakika Qur'ani bila ya shaka ni kauli ya Mjumbe anaye toka kwa Mwenyezi Mungu, naye ni mwenye kuhishimiwa kwake,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
